sentences.sContent: There's a thief hanging on the gallows out there, and I'll cut his hand off; which hand was it?
sentences.sContent_eng: There's a thief hanging on the gallows out there, and I'll cut his hand off; which hand was it?
sentences.sCn: 我想办法帮你渡过难关.外面绞刑架上吊着一个小偷.我去把他的手切下来.哪只手呢?""

sentences.sContent: Richard Crowninshield thought he would avoid the gallows—and might well have—had Joe Knapp not confessed his role in the plot to the Rev. Colman.
sentences.sContent_eng: Richard Crowninshield thought he would avoid the gallows—and might well have—had Joe Knapp not confessed his role in the plot to the Rev. Colman.
sentences.sCn: 理查德·克劳宁希尔德以为自己能逃脱绞刑——事实也的确如此，因为乔·克纳普不承认他先前对科尔曼神父的供词。

phrases.pCn: 充满怨恨的幽默；化解严重场面或僵局的幽默（等于gallows humour）

trans.tranOther: a structure used for killing criminals by hanging from a rope
